comprehensive_overview: PyRanges is a Python library for working with genomic ranges. It provides an efficient and intuitive way to manipulate genomic intervals and perform set operations on them.
core_features: Key features include creating, manipulating, and analyzing genomic intervals, performing set operations such as intersection, union, difference, and complement on ranges, supporting both one-dimensional and two-dimensional ranges, integrating with pandas DataFrames, enabling fast and memory-efficient operations on large datasets, and providing a user-friendly API for genomic data processing.
